p: The VA-C extracts were shown to inhibit the growth of all tested Candida species and the inhibition activity depended on the solvent type and Candida species. The results showed that C. tropicalis was the most inhibited by all the extracts followed by C. albicans and C. ciferrii (all P = 0.01). The effects of the ethanol extract against C. tropicalis, C. albicans and C. ciferrii were significantly higher compared to water and methanol extracts at P = 0.01, P = 0.037 and P = 0.047, respectively ( Table 1).
